Welcome to Try To Rescue Anime Girl - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Try To Rescue Anime Girl - a cool escape game?

Try To Rescue Anime Girl Game is another point and click room escape game Developed by Bamvd.Com. Welcome back, escapers! Story of this game , Assume you live in a small town next to the ocean. One day after the school you set out with your friends to play treasure
search in a deserted fishing house on the shore.you have a date with your Anime girl on Evening. And it’s about time, when you went to her home, you found her house is
locked but you heard her voice, asking for help. She must be trapped inside. So use your skills to collect the necessary in the house to rescue your cute girl.


Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life.


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
